attributes.additional_details: When Concorde blew up and everyone was killed, people thought it was a design flaw but actually it was just a rod of metal that had got stuck in the engine. By that time Concorde had lost its air licence and no one could be bothered to renew it.
attributes.background: It will help people go to places faster and it will also bring back amazing historic engineering. It will be slightly altered and so it will be more friendly and less complicated.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the design and operation of commercial aircraft.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to provide incentives for airlines to reintroduce supersonic flight.
